name: CheckMyBMI
0:
”Alexa, open check my b. m. i.”
”Calculate My BMI”
”What is My BMI”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: check my b. m. i.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Keep track of your BMI (Body Mass Index). Input your weight and height to know your BMI. This skill accepts weight in Kilograms or Pound and Height in Centimetres or Feet. Simply ask alexa followings:
- Calculate My BMI 
- What is BMI
- What is My BMI
- My Weight is 53 kilograms and height is 170 centimeters
- What would be my BMI if my weight is 67 kilograms and height is 200 centimetres

Please note, BMI(Body Mass Index) is measure of body fat based on height and weight. BMI is only applicable for adults. The indicative BMI number does not guarantee your personal health.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
